post:
Hello LET!  
  
TNAHosting is happy to bring a few deals in our offer post this time around. We've been in business since 2012, providing a variety of reliable and cost effective services. 
  
  
**6GB OpenVZ - Chicago, IL**  
* 1 IPv4 [IPv6 available]  
* 2x vCPU  
* 200GB HDD  
* 2TB Bandwidth  
* $5/m - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=54)  
  
  
**Dual L5420 - Chicago, IL**  
* 2x L5420 – 8 cores @ 2.5GHz  
* 24GB DDR2 RAM  
* 500GB HDD  
* 5TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps  
* Dedicated IPMI  
* /29 IPv4 [IPv6 available]      
* $29/m – [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=51)  
  
  
**512MB OpenVZ - Atlanta, GA**  
* 1 IPv4  
* 2x vCPU  
* 15GB SSD Cached Disk  
* _5TB Bandwidth_  
* $2.50/month - $24/year - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=56)  
  
Virtual servers are setup instantly after payment, dedicated servers will be setup in 1-3 business days.  
  
Chicago Looking Glass: http://lg.chi.tnahosting.net/  
Atlanta Test IP: 170.75.152.134  
    
We accept PayPal, Major Credit/Debit Cards (Stripe), and Bitcoin.  
  
Have questions or need something custom? Feel free to PM me or open a [sales ticket](https://tnahosting.net/billing/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=2).
